meta-runner.name: K - Install and configure KLR
meta-runner.description: Installs the latest KLR runtime for ASP.NET 5 builds.

parameters.param:
@echo off cd %teamcity.build.workingDir%
SETLOCAL
IF EXIST packages\KoreBuild goto run %teamcity.tool.NuGet.CommandLine.DEFAULT.nupkg%\tools\nuget.exe install KoreBuild -ExcludeVersion -o packages -nocache -pre -Source https://www.myget.org/F/aspnetvnext/api/v2
:run CALL packages\KoreBuild\build\dnvm upgrade -runtime CLR -x86 CALL packages\KoreBuild\build\dnvm install default -runtime CoreCLR -x86 CALL packages\KoreBuild\build\dnvm use default -runtime CLR -x86
